title: Getting Started with Akira Docs Configuration
description: Instructions on configuring Akira Docs to suit your project's needs, including customization options.
author: Akira Docs Team

blocks.content: Before you begin configuring Akira Docs, ensure you have the following prerequisites:

Node.js
npm or Yarn
Basic understanding of JSON
Follow these steps to set up your configuration:

git clone https://github.com/yourusername/akira-docs.git
cd akira-docs
npm install
Create a file named `akiradocs.config.json` in the root of your project directory. This file should contain your configuration settings in JSON format.
You can customize various aspects of your Akira Docs setup by modifying the configuration file. Here are some options you can include:
Once you have configured your settings, run the development server to see your changes in action.
You are now ready to customize Akira Docs to fit your project's needs. Explore further options in the documentation to enhance your setup.
